title: CBP Smart Glasses Footage from LA August 8

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

### Background ###

CBP/Border Patrol officers arrested multiple people on August 6 in a widely reported event at a Home Depot in the Westlake neighborhood. You can read about the event here: https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/aug/06/ice-border-patrol-home-depot-los-angeles

And CBP officials have posted footage from the raid themselves: https://x.com/CMDROpAtLargeCA/status/1953616253270327491

### Request ###

- All footage recorded by officers during this August 6 raid. This also includes any footage captured by smart glasses, including but not limited to Meta Ray-Ban glasses.

In your assessment of fees, you should know that I am a journalist working for 404 Media and that this request is made in the context of news gathering.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joseph Cox
